title: Siscon Ani to Brocon Imouto ga Shoujiki ni Nattara
description:
[b][u]English:[/u][/b]
Even in high school, Ritsu and Uta really get along, but suddenly, they have to pretend to be lovers...!?

The real brother-sister exciting love comedy starts!!

[b][u]Portuguese / Português:[/u][/b]
[spoiler]Embora eles sejam estudantes do ensino médio, Ritsu e Uta são amigos e irmãos íntimos ao mesmo tempo. Num certo dia, esses dois fingem estar apaixonados ...! A comédia romântica entre irmãos reais estará cheia de emoções![/spoiler]

related.title: Siscon Ani to Brocon Imouto ga Fuufu ni Nattara Shiawase Sugite Bakuhatsushisou

matches.title: My stepsister who says Go die go die to me every day, tries to hypnotize me to fall for her while I was sleeping...!
Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Double Seven-hen
